title: New Thinking in a Pandemic: Don Moore & Annie Duke
author: Laura Counts
excerpt: Two top experts on decision making came together for a discussion of probabilistic thinking in the age of the coronavirus. Prof. Don Moore, who studies overconfidence, interviewed Annie Duke, a decision strategist and former professional poker champion.
